n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

res = []
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == s - a[i]:
        res.append(i+1)

print(len(res))
print(*res)

sum_a = sum(a)

nice = []

for i in range(n):

        nice.append(i+1)

print(len(nice))
print(*nice)

#!/usr/bin/env python3

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

#print(n, a)

sum_a = sum(a)

nice = []

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == sum_a - a[i]:
        nice.append(i+1)

print(len(nice))
print(*nice)
#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
Created on Tue Mar  3 18:33:57 2020

@author: alexanderniewiarowski
"""


n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# print(n, a)

sum_a = sum(a)

nice = []

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == sum_a - a[i]:
        nice.append(i + 1)

print(len(nice))
print(*nice)

        nice.append(i+1)

print(len(nice))
print(*nice)

        res.append(i + 1)

print(*res)
